content.raw:
I'm seeing a recurrence of the pkg-config bug fixed in [ign-cmake pr 56](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/56/fix-pkgconfig-type-logic-for-core-project/diff) for the ign-msgs1 dependency, since it is using ign-cmake0 (ie. ignition-msgs1 is excluded from the pkg-config requires section)

I think we may want to switch to ign-msgs2 here, but we should also try to fix this bug if possible

cc @mxgrey
